trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Greenville
There was one other sighting in Greenville on or around March 7th 2002
divs: Sighting Details i was loading a motor home for a short vacation. Iwas handing material up to be loaded on top of home when I saw object appear inthe sky. It appeared that object was making a long curve to the southwest whichallowed me to see the top of cone. It was a brilliant bluish-green color. After observing it for one to two seconds it disappeared. It was hard to tellexact size due to clear skies. There was no sound to distinguish due to thefact that my son-in-law had just cranked up the motor home to run airconditioner.
